msbt.message: My usual morning walk takes me right by the post office, and this morning I thought, hey—why not write my buddy a letter? So I did. It feels pretty good! You should try writing one to me too!

You know I have no patience for slacking off, but that ain't the same thing as taking breaks. Even I can't go 100% ALL the time. Something's gonna give. Life's already tough, so you don't gotta make it tougher!

I visited home a while back and got to watch my cousin's kid. That little rug rat is so stinkin' CUTE! I know I got a tough reputation, which is fair 'cause I'm tough, but little kids just get me right there.
Last time I did the big spring cleaning, I cleared out the closet and found a whole pile of plushes I forgot about. (I used to be scary good at crane games.) I hate to just throw 'em out... I mean...
There's a lot in this world you COULD care about. But the only thing worth caring about is friends. If you don't have folks to hang out with, or write letters to, what do you really have? Nothing!
I went back to my hometown to see my peeps from the old days. Funny, I remember them as being way wilder than they are now. But I guess I've settled down too, huh? Time'll do that to you.

Things haven't been too rosy for me lately, but you don't see me moping over it. That's 'cause I'm thankful even for the bad times! You take all that stuff and use it for fertilizer, then see what blooms.
You ever see a photo of me when I was younger? Me and all my friends in pleather jackets with tons of spikes and studs—all black, except our hair, which was neon. Look, I didn't invent the style.
I was working in my garden, and I must've got carried away yelling at the aphids and slugs and stuff, 'cause I looked up and saw one of my neighbors running scared. Do I have that effect on everyone?

I was all psyched up to send you a letter, so I grabbed a pen and some paper, sat down, and...right away forgot what I was gonna write you about. I'll write again if I remember, so hang tight till then, OK?
